root.name: Team Xtreme: Operation Weather Disaster
root.description: Team X-Treme Operation Weather Disaster is a team of weather battlers! Help the team by defeating the Evil Weather Man from destroying the Earth with his evil weather plans. The game is educational by teaching the basics of weather from weather itself to barometers and facts about historical places. The game consists of levels and if you decide to play this game you better make sure you save after EVERY level. This game does NOT auto save so if you lose during a level and didn't save the previous level you will have to start off where you last saved, which was hopefully not the beginning level.REQUIREMENTS TO PLAY THE GAME:Quicktime version 2.0.1 (most downloads will have quicktime 2.0.1 in the file)Windows 2000 or higher
